11.content: And what happens to Baloo?
11.title: Baloo

choices: He makes it easily.
He hits a storm and goes down on the wrong island.
He runs out of fuel and has to turn back.
112.content:
Spring cleaning. It wasn't pleasant or fun but it was necessary. Baloo sighed as he started to go through old boxes full of junk. Old plane parts, old clothes, old toys... everything was just trash that should have been tossed out ages ago. But here he was trying to sort through it to find something, anything, worth keeping. He had already chucked several boxes and sighed again as he realized he had nothing worth keeping still. Though something in one old chest did catch his eye...

"What's this...?" he said softly, digging under some old navigation tools.

Out came a yellowed map of a group of islands he had never seen before. They looked close enough to fly to and back on a tank of fuel but he had been all over and had never seen anything out that way. He scratched his head and took the map out, spreading it on his plane as he tried to figure out the coordinates. Once he had figured out where they could be mathematically he checked his fuel, left a note saying he was going out exploring for a few hours, and hopped into the plane.

The propeller whirred and the engine roared as he started to take off, zipping into the sky and out toward those islands...
112.title: He finds a map to a secret land.

choices: He saw a group of fat native men coming his way.
He saw a group of skinny native men coming his way.
He saw a mix of native people coming his way.
1122.content:
All went well for the first hour or so. Then Baloo noticed the sky darken and raindrops started to splatter on the windows. He had seen worse and wasn't too worried so he continued on, checking the map against what his instruments told him. He was going in the right direction so there wasn't too much to worry about and he'd be there in no time! The map said there was a treasure on one of the islands but wasn't really specific about what it was. There was just some sort of X on a part of the island and a note about a big treasure. Maybe if it was still there Baloo would be rich!

A sudden flash of lightning illuminated the cockpit and thunder blared. Baloo gulped and started to look for somewhere to land but all he saw was ocean. He wasn't too worried yet but another flash went by. More thunder boomed and Baloo knew he needed to land. He swooped down to see if there was a spot to land when lightning suddenly hit his wing. He yelped in fear and started going down, down, down...

The next thing he knew he was facedown in something gritty and he was incredibly wet. His eyes opened slowly, vision fuzzy, but he could tell it was still raining. A crackling from behind him told him that the plane was likely destroyed and beyond repair. He rolled over with a groan at the pain of having crashed and saw that the plane was indeed more mess than machine. The engine had caught fire and one wing was charred where the lightning had hit. Baloo just fell back into the sand and sighed. Then...
1122.title: He hits a storm and goes down on the wrong island.

choices: Turn him into their fat god!
Fatten him up as a sacrifice!
11221.content:
Baloo stared off into the distance, his vision growing hazy from the mixture of smoke, fumes, and head trauma. Suddenly he could make out shapes that were moving slowly forward toward him. As they neared, he realized with a mix of shock and relief that it was a tribe of native men! As they approached, Baloo noticed that each of them were easily just as heavy as he was! However, these natives were a fair bit shorter than Baloo, causing their weight to make them appear much fatter than our ursine hero. Baloo attempted to call out, but his words were met with a sharp sting in his side. He looked down to see a bright red feather sticking out of his abdomen just before the world went black.

Groggily, Baloo came to in what appeared to be a lush green jungle. He stared up at the canopy of trees swaying in the island breeze, a slight relaxing calm taking hold of him as he did. His reverie was interrupted by the realization that he was chained to a stone slab in the middle of several very wide huts. Suddenly he saw the corpulent island men from before return. The largest one, who was wearing a sort of headress and carrying a staff, approached Baloo. He began to speak very loudly to the rest of the crowd in a language that Baloo couldn't understand. As the man talked, periodically, almost in rhythm with what he was saying, he would belch or break wind. Baloo cringed, but he was intrigued. It almost seemed that passing of gas was part of these peoples' language.

Baloo was snapped out of his contemplation as the Chief poked him in the belly with his staff. The Chief began to make motions to the others. Motioning to his own torso and spreading his hands farther and farther apart. Baloo began to wonder what all of this meant. Soon, his thinking time was once again interreupted as several of the men began to poor a large bowl of liquid into Baloo's mouth! Surprised, he thrashed about, attempting to stop them, but the restraints did their job and Baloo was forced to swallow the concoction. Baloo could feel an uneasiness growing in his stomach. Little did he know that the men intended to...
11221.title: Big Natives

choices: Realized he wanted this!
Realized he had to escape!
112211.content:
Little did he know that the men intended to turn him into their fat god. As he recovered from swallowing the sudden liquid he noticed one of the men brought a book forward. He opened it up to show some pictures drawn in a very colorful manner. The first pages showed a flaming ball coming down from the sky on one page and the next had a group of fat natives dragging out something that looked quite a bit like himself. The next few pages showed the figure in varying states of... growth. Bigger and bigger he grew until the last set of drawings. It was just one that ended up on both pages, showing the figure being rather content in his gigantic size with a huge, brown cloud forming behind him. He also had become rather largely endowed with men all around him.

The man who had brought the book forward pointed from the book to Baloo and he quickly caught on. He gasped, realizing what this meant. Soon he had paws all over his belly and sides as the men seemed to be testing him. Baloo blushed and started to panic. His plane was destroyed, he was chained up in a hut, no one knew where he was, and these men wanted to turn him into a massive beast of a man. As he looked at the picture again he...
112211.title: Turn him into their fat god!

He wanted them to make things more comfy
1122111.content:
It took a few minutes for the reality of his situation to sink in for Baloo. Everything was happening so fast, one minute he's flying his plane and the next he's tied up by a tribe of obese natives. Baloo had always loved his massive girth, he always dreamed of getting fatter. He looked at the picture of the enormously obese blob from the book, he wanted to be huge like that, Baloo couldn't contain his excitement. While the natives rubbed his big belly, Baloo shifted his weight to the side and ripped a monstrous fart that made his whole body jiggle and shook the ground beneath him. The natives stood in disbelief, all eyes fixed upon the huge bear who was starting to sweat. The chief waddled up to Baloo, his stomach hung down to almost his knees. Wearing only a headress of feathers and a loincloth that was mostly wedged up his huge ass, the chief inhaled deeply and slapped Baloo's belly with his own. He took off his headress and placed it carefully on Baloo's head, the tribe members all kneeled down and bowed their heads, their god of gluttony had arrived. Baloo had a whole village of people worshiping him, dedicated to making him as fat as possible and taking care of everything their god demands. Baloo was in heaven.

It was time to start living the life of a God, his servants couldn't wait to fulfill his demands, the first of which was...
1122111.title: It is a dream come true for Baloo

choices: Baloo gets more after a festival in his honor.
Baloo gets more from a boy he's taken a liking to.
11221111.content:
It was time to start living the life of a God, his servants couldn't wait to fulfill his demands, the first of which was food and lots of it too. After some pantomiming eating food the men finally realized what it was Baloo wanted. They hurried off to get him food while some men who he assumed to be guards undid the shackles now that he seemed to be willing to stay. They got him extra pillows to set around him and prop him up on so he was extra comfortable. Baloo wiggled his large butt and got in position for feeding. Then the food started to stream in via huge baskets carried by multiple men and he began to eat...

...and eat...

...and eat...

After a mere week of gorging on the food of the island Baloo had grown considerably. His belly was much softer and rolled out toward his knees, his moobs had folded over onto his gut, and his butt had blimped into two, big, round smelly orbs. His arms and legs were much softer and sagged more; his thighs now huge silos of flab. Whatever this island had in its soil was causing the food to be extra fattening. No wonder these natives were so fat. But Baloo just smiled and ate more.

Baloo had managed to learn some of the language of the men and had managed to teach some a few English words. Though he found their language quite fun as it involved belching and farting as part of it. Far better and almost easier than English but it wasn't as practical since he was constantly so gassy now. He did want to mistakenly say something wrong after all.

He had finished another big bowl of the stuff he was first fed with. The weird, thick, almost smoothie like food that he came to crave which was likely also having a hand in his growth. "URP! BURRRP! BBBWWWWUUUUURRRRRRRPPP!" Baloo belched. "Ooough, feels good... Mm... we got more of that stuff?"
11221111.title: Baloo wants food, lots of it.

choices: Cue the festival!
Something dramatic happens before the festival can take place!
112211111.content:
It wasn't long before Baloo had his wish granted. Over the next few days the increasingly growing bear sat content on his throne, dining on platters of exotic meat and rich, creamy chocolate with all the manners of a ravenous pig as his fellow obese subjects slowly set up a series of stalls, banners, flags and torches around him.

"*Prrrffffffffft~!* Mmmmm, this is the life, eh fellas? *Brrrrppbrpbrrrrrrrrrpt~!*" Baloo asked as he playful shook his growing man-boobs, letting them slap against his doughy furry belly as he let his rear do the translating. The fat bear had soon grown accustomed to the tribe's gaseous-founded language; even if he wasn't a hundred percent sure what was being expelled at him, Baloo had taken a strange liking to the stench that permutated around them. "What's with all the decorations though; is it my birthday or something?" Waiting for a response before he remembered who he was talking to, Baloo with a struggle heaved himself slowly up and let his ass erupt his sentence for the next minute or so, his butt-sweat giving his dialect a somewhat naughty accent to the tribesmen.

A smaller bear, perhaps a simple message boy, slowly lumbered up to Baloo and explained to him how before taking up the mantle of being their fat smelly god, he had to undergo his coronation. It involved a series of three trials, each representing a different quality of the previous incarnations of their god to prove he was the chosen one; the Test of Air, the Test of Hunger and the Test of Love. All three were music to Baloo's ears; just live up the slothful, hedonistic lifestyle these fat-lusting tribes people wanted out of him, and he was set for life. There was also a murmuring of a mighty rock which fell from the sky every year, yet by the time the boy had started to trumpet his way to that part of the story Baloo had already started to blissfully day dream. To top it all off, at the end of this festival Baloo was to treat everyone to a stunning display of disgusting gluttony as he was dunked into a large bath of the tribe's mystery goop and eat it in front of them!

Snuggling his obese frame into his throne as he drifted off to sleep to the sound of his royal band of smelly butt trumpeters, Baloo dreamed of his big, foul-smelling future...
112211111.title: Baloo gets more after a festival in his honor.

choices: Baloo passes the trial!
Baloo fails...
1122111111.content:
A few glorious gluttony-filled days past and soon it was time for the festival! The entire tribe of fat men were there, dressed in their best loincloths. Banners depicting all kinds of food hung from all over the village. Baloo was feeling an incredible sense of pride at all this. It was about a month since the bear had landed on the island, and the month had been VERY good to him. Baloo had weighed about 350 pounds when he crashed, and, had a scale been readily accesible, it would have shown him to be a very large 750 pounds of bear blubber!

Suddenly a loud fart echoed throughout the village. Everyone stopped and looked as the Elder motioned for everyone to gather around Baloo. A series of gaseous emissions informed Baloo that it was time for him to prove himself as their fat god. The first test would be the 'Test of Air.' Baloo started to wonder what exactly this meant. An answer came as the Elder began to describe the trial: (translated for your reading pleasure)

"The first test will be the Test of Air. Our god could produce so much wind himself that the trees themselves would bend to his air. You must do the same. Show us that you can create as much air as our god did!"

A cheer went up from the crowd as the Elder finished his speech. They all turned to Baloo, eager to see his feat of 'Air.' Baloo just stared back, confused by what they really meant by this. He thought it over for a while, but could come to no real conclusion. Soon, Baloo felt the familiar building of gas in his abdomen, but, realizing what he had to do, he didn't let it out. Instead he held it in with all his might. Baloo realized that to pass the trial he would have to let rip the most massive fart ever! So he held in his gas. With all his might he clamped his tail hole closed, the gas building inside him. Minutes turned to hours. Baloo began to wonder if he would be able to make it as his belly bulged out with the accumulated gas...

His belly grew a little bit more as the gas inside him groaned loudly. He clutched the sides of his gut and widened his stance. The sweat started to mat his fur and his teeth were bared down hard. Baloo grinned widely at the admiration of all of his devotees. He felt so amazing, so powerful for having commanded such force through farting. In fact it seemed now that each fart he passed had a much stronger impact than they had before the trial, almost as if he had gained some mysterious power!

Once again the Elder approached Baloo and began to speak:

"Congratulations! You have shown yourself worthy to command the air of our god! Next you must show that you have the hunger of our god as well! When he first fell to our land, our god devoured all in sight! You must show that you can do the same! Follow me!"

The elder turned, his fat butt bouncing as he waddled toward a not-too far off clearing ahead. Baloo and the crowd slowly followed. Baloo's eyes bugged out of his head when he saw what was ahead of him! The entire clearing was full of food! All kinds of odd and rare delicacies lie out in front of the big bear. Drool began to run down his muzzle as he looked around. It looked as if the men had harvested every bit of food on the island for him!

The Elder looked back at Baloo. "Eat!" was all he said. Soon the smaller men began to chant the same word as well. "EAT! EAT! EAT!"

Baloo looked out over the feast and began to dig into the nearest dish to him. It tasted even better than the rest of the food that he had been fed up to this point! The trees were knocked aside and clouds of sand were kicked up as the massive... thing... rumbled closer to the clearing everyone was in.

"...Karnage?!" Baloo said in shock.

He looked at what had waddled out of the jungle and saw it was a very, very, very obese version of the leader of the pirates. This is a story in which the main male characters from the television show Talespin gain weight, grow huge, and get slobby (and anything else!) Please add, but try to keep the additions to a decent length.

Anything goes really, just keep relationships age-appropriate! (No underage sex or anything.)
